## Vector4.(constructor)

Creates a Vector4 object from the given floats.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(
    x: number, 
    y: number, 
    z: number, 
    w: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | x value of the vector |
|  y | <code>number</code> | y value of the vector |
|  z | <code>number</code> | z value of the vector |
|  w | <code>number</code> | w value of the vector |
